name: First Flight
description:
In First Flight you play as a young bird who is leaving the comfort of their nest for the first time to learn how to fly. 

How far can you get before inevitably crashing to the ground?

Flap your wings to maintain altitude and avoid the tree branches.

Team: Thomas Van Bouwel  @ThomasVanBouwel, Victoria McGuire  @Mistakenly_Evil, Boris Milivojevic, Claudia Cunaud - serane155.artstation.com

Audio Team: Walter Fiorini, Cornelius Tanghe, Maxime Quardon

Requires Oculus or Vive
